faq-1.title: What is Netflix?
faq-1.description: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

faq-2.title: How muc does Netflix cost?
faq-2.description: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from 29 zł to 60 zł a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

faq-3.title: Where can I watch?
faq-3.description: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

faq-4.title: How do I cancel?
faq-4.description: Netflix is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.

faq-5.title: What can I watch on Netflix?
faq-5.description: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

faq-6.title: Is Netflix good for kids?
faq-6.description: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space.
